rows: JSON data of system schemas. Dumps all system schemas and their columns except for data specified in the-excludedSchemasparameter.
JSON data of configuration element schemas. Dumps all schemas except for data specified in the-excludedSchemasparameter.
Localizable XML resources of configuration element schemas.
Localizable XML content of configuration element schemas. Dumps only the text columns. Specify additional restrictions in the-excludedSchemasand-excludedSchemaColumnsparameters.
JSON data of system schemas and configuration element schemas. The combination ofSystemDataandConfigurationDatavalues.
html:
SystemData

JSON data of system schemas. Dumps all system schemas and their columns except for data specified in the -excludedSchemas parameter.

ConfigurationData

JSON data of configuration element schemas. Dumps all schemas except for data specified in the -excludedSchemas parameter.

Resources

Localizable XML resources of configuration element schemas.

LocalizableData

Localizable XML content of configuration element schemas. Dumps only the text columns. Specify additional restrictions in the -excludedSchemas and -excludedSchemaColumns parameters.

Repository

ZIP workspace data.

SqlScripts

SQL scripts bound to packages.

Data

JSON data of system schemas and configuration element schemas. The combination of SystemData and ConfigurationData values.

LocalizableSchemaData

Data of localizable objects.

All

All content types.
